comment.author: Matthew
comment.text: Wit h GOD on our side, who can be against us! In GOD we trust! GOD bless American! And Israel! Where the Spirit of the LORD is there is freedom!

replies.author: Jordan
replies.text: Everyone.... If you believe God supports a 3 time adulterer and foul mouthed non-practicing 'Christian' who see's money as his God and is loyal to no one... Then you have chosen the wrong candidate to support and tag 'God' in

replies.author: Nicole
replies.text: Read your Bible man. Trump isn't the only imperfect man God put in charge.
